paragraphs.content: Judge me, O LORD; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the LORD; therefore I shall not slide.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Judge me, O Lord; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the Lord; therefore I shall not slide.

paragraphs.content: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Examine me, O Lord, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.

paragraphs.content: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.

paragraphs.content: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.

paragraphs.content: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.

paragraphs.content: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O LORD:
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O Lord:

paragraphs.content: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.

paragraphs.content: LORD, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lord, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.

paragraphs.content: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:

paragraphs.content: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.

paragraphs.content: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.

paragraphs.content: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the Lord.
